    Subclasses of Enemy in com.vtuberrush.src.enemies
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    SlimeBlue
    A Blue Slime (Level 2 Slime) is a subclass of an Enemy with 250 health and 27 movement speed.
    class 
    SlimeGreen
    A Green Slime (Level 1 Slime) is a subclass of an Enemy with 100 health and 36 movement speed.
    class 
    SlimePurple
    A Purple Slime (Level 4 Slime) is a subclass of an Enemy with 1,562 health and 15.12 movement speed.
    class 
    SlimeRed
    A Red Slime (Level 3 Slime) is a subclass of an Enemy with 625 health and 20.28 movement speed.
    class 
    SlimeWhite
    A White Slime (Level 5 Slime) is a subclass of an Enemy with 3,906 health and 11.40 movement speed.

    Methods in com.vtuberrush.src.managers with parameters of type Enemy
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    ProjectileManager.addProjectile​(Unit unit, Enemy enemy)
    Checks whether the unit is within range of an enemy, and creates a projectile in the direction of the enemy if true.
    Calculates the velocity and rotation of the projectile being fired.
    boolean
    UnitManager.isNearby​(Unit unit, Enemy enemy)
    Uses the distance formula to check if the enemy can be attacked.

  • Uses of Enemy in com.vtuberrush.src.scenes

    Methods in com.vtuberrush.src.scenes with parameters of type Enemy
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    Playing.blastEnemy​(Unit unit, Enemy enemy)
    Deals damage to the passed enemy that is near the passed unit.
    Called when a Petra unit spots an enemy within range.
    void
    Playing.shootEnemy​(Unit unit, Enemy enemy)
    Creates a projectile in the location of the passed unit, which travels to the passed enemy based on the unit's existing projectile speed.
